attributes.action: Put the Welsh dragon on the Union Jack.
attributes.additional_details: I know Wales isn't a country under UK law and it is a principality of England, but a symbolic representation would make us feel more included when people around the world speak of British people and leave us out. It hurts my soul as a Welshman when people speak of the UK and they don't even know Wales is a country with it's own language, culture and heritage.
attributes.background: England, Scotland and Northern Ireland are represented on the Union Jack except Wales. Wales is excluded from being represented as a country and after 1600 years it's time to get even just a symbolic representation.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701611
